Agreed. Cut. Only.

Really? I don’t like cut. I prefer dicks to not look like mushrooms with thick stems.

Plus if you’re uncut, that brings in other opportunities, such as docking, which is just plain awesome.

@Kihomura - See i like you, your honest, I respect you for that.
@The Homophobes - Please Continue, I like to see people throw abuse at gay people it makes them look like juvenile morons. You probably would never say it to my face, so why say it here? Does it make you feel superior? I would like to know.
You don’t know me so please don’t judge me because of my sexual orentation.
[/quote]
fag[/quote]
